organizations.name: Global Canada Initiative
quotes: Robert Greenhill is Executive Chairman, Global Canada Initiative, and Professor of Practice at the Institute for the Study of International Development, McGill University.

organizations.name: Institute for the Study of International Development, McGill University
quotes: Robert Greenhill is Executive Chairman, Global Canada Initiative, and Professor of Practice at the Institute for the Study of International Development, McGill University.

organizations.name: World Economic Forum
quotes: Previous roles include Managing Director and Chief Business Officer of the World Economic Forum, Deputy Minister and President of the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA), and President and Chief Operating Officer of the International Group of Bombardier Inc.

quotes: Previous roles include Managing Director and Chief Business Officer of the World Economic Forum, Deputy Minister and President of the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA), and President and Chief Operating Officer of the International Group of Bombardier Inc.

organizations.name: University of Alberta
quotes: Robert has a BA from the University of Alberta, MA from the London School of Economics, and MBA from INSEAD.

organizations.name: London School of Economics
quotes: Robert has a BA from the University of Alberta, MA from the London School of Economics, and MBA from INSEAD.

organizations.name: INSEAD
quotes: Robert has a BA from the University of Alberta, MA from the London School of Economics, and MBA from INSEAD.

organizations.name: Public Health Agency of Canada
quotes: The Emerging Infectious Diseases Modelling Initiative (EIDM) – by the Public Health Agency of Canada and NSERC – aims to establish multi-disciplinary network(s) of specialists across the country in modelling infectious diseases to be applied to public needs associated with emerging infectious diseases and pandemics such as COVID-19.

organizations.name: NSERC
quotes: The Emerging Infectious Diseases Modelling Initiative (EIDM) – by the Public Health Agency of Canada and NSERC – aims to establish multi-disciplinary network(s) of specialists across the country in modelling infectious diseases to be applied to public needs associated with emerging infectious diseases and pandemics such as COVID-19.

organizations.name: Centre de recherches mathématiques (CRM)
quotes: Founded in 1968, the Centre de recherches mathématiques (CRM) is dedicated to excellence in research
